rows.label: qev070102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Now, how's about I ask you a few questions and you
give me specific, concise answers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0002
rows.name:
Run your mouth or try to lie, and we'll have to try
again in a setting you'll find a lot less...comfortable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0003
rows.name:
You're smart—you don't want any needless trouble.
Best for everyone involved if you just cooperate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0004
rows.name: So, question one—what did Professor B want from you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_JNK0010
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev070102_SEL0011
rows.name: Reveal the job Professor B gave you.

rows.label: qev070102_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev070102_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask just who Gadd is.

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0005
rows.name: The hell does he want with that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0006
rows.name:
I swear, the big guy's technology makes zero damned
sense to us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0007
rows.name:
I thought you were smart. Maybe I'm wrong.
Is who I am more important than your own life?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0008
rows.name:
All right, fine by me. I'll just invite you to a VIP room
where nobody can ever get in to help you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0009
rows.name:
You'll have all the time in the world to see how I do
my job. Give ya the Gadd special! Heh heh...
You're never seeing home again, pal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0010
rows.name:
On to question two—what do you know about the
professor's research?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_JNK0030
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev070102_SEL0031
rows.name: Truthfully admit that you do not know anything.

rows.label: qev070102_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev070102_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Gadd why he is interested in Professor B's work.

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0011
rows.name:
Yeah, okay. Figures. He's a pretty cautious guy.
Wouldn't let anyone in too easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0012
rows.name:
It's a huge pain, but it looks like I'll have to kidnap the
guy if I want a crack at that tech...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0013
rows.name:
I thought you were smart. Maybe I'm wrong.
Is what I want more important than your own life?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0014
rows.name:
All right, fine by me. I'll just invite you to a VIP room
where nobody can ever get in to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0015
rows.name:
You'll have all the time in the world to see how I do
my job. Give ya the Gadd special! Heh heh...
You're never seeing home again, pal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0016
rows.name:
All right, you're doing great so far. A real champ.
I just got one last question for you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0017
rows.name:
Drowned in the sea or filled with holes here and now?
How would you rather die?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_JNK0050
rows.name: Choose Sea

rows.label: qev070102_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you would prefer to drown.

rows.label: qev070102_JNK0060
rows.name: Choose Holes

rows.label: qev070102_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Gadd that you definitely prefer the holes.

rows.label: qev070102_JNK0070
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev070102_SEL0071
rows.name: Explain that you do not plan on dying today.

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0018
rows.name: Hey, all right! I was hoping to hit the beach today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0019
rows.name:
Don't worry—I promise to make it nice and painless.
The waves will rock you to sleep like your dear ol' ma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0020
rows.name: Hey, [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] wants to go out with a bang! I like it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0021
rows.name:
You got it, boss. I'll put so many bullets into you,
your dear ol' ma won't even recognize ya![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0022
rows.name: Well, ain't you the confident one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070102_MSG0023
rows.name:
The good news is you won't live to regret it long.
Now die pissing yourself, ya cocky punk![ST:wait ]
